overview: Named after the prison number of Nelson Mandela when he was held on Robben Island, the 46664 campaign aims to raise awareness of the HIV/AIDS epidemic in Africa to the rest of the world. The 46664 concert was held on November 29th 2003 in Cape Town and includes performances from global stars such as: Queen, Beyonce, Peter Gabriel and Ms Dynamite. The concert for Nelson Mandela's 46664 campaign, held on 29th November 2003 at Green Point Stadium, Cape Town. Tracklisting includes Beyonce - 'Crazy In Love', Paul Oakenfold - 'Starry Eyed Surprise', Queen - 'The Show Must Go On', The Corrs - 'Breathless', Eurythmics - 'Sweet Dreams', Ms. Dynamite - 'It Takes More', Bono and The Edge - 'One'.
title: 46664: The Event
